title.value: Example Suspected Disorder Lab Obs Triggers for Public Health Reporting

description.value: This example set of values contains lab order codes that represent that the patient may have a potentially reportable lab order.

copyright.value: This material contains content from LOINC (http://loinc.org). display.value: Diphtheria identified in Bronchial specimen by Organism specific culture
Listeria sp tuf gene [Presence] by Probe in Positive blood culture
Listeria sp DNA [Presence] by NAA with probe detection in Positive blood culture
Neisseria meningitidis Ag [Units/volume] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Latex agglutination
Neisseria meningitidis serogroups A+C+w135+Y Ag [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Latex agglutination
Neisseria meningitidis serogroup B+Escherichia coli K1 Ag [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Latex agglutination
SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) N gene [Presence] in Specimen by Nucleic acid amplification using CDC primer-probe set N1
